trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event occurs when the user clicks a panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento ocorre quando o usuário clica em um painel no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs> specifies which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> was clicked, the mouse button that was pressed, how many times it was pressed, and the coordinates of the mouse click at the time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs> Especifica qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> foi clicado, botão do mouse foi pressionado, quantas vezes ela foi pressionada e as coordenadas do clique do mouse no momento em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event to perform tasks related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> being clicked.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os dados fornecidos por essa classe em um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento para executar tarefas relacionadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> ser clicado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is used to display the time, you could create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event and use data provided by this class to display a dialog box that allows you to modify the date and time on the system.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> é usado para exibir a hora, você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> dados de uso e eventos fornecidos por essa classe para exibir uma caixa de diálogo que permite que você modifique a data e hora do sistema.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> named `StatusBar1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> chamado `StatusBar1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> values that represents the mouse buttons that were clicked while over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> que representa os botões do mouse que foram clicados enquanto estavam sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the mouse button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O número de vezes que o botão do mouse recebeu um clique.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X do clique do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y do clique do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs.StatusBarPanel%2A> property enables you to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs.StatusBarPanel%2A> propriedade permite que você obtenha o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to perform tasks such as displaying custom dialog boxes when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar isso no manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> caixas de controle para executar tarefas como exibir a caixa de diálogo personalizada quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> chamado `StatusBar1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.
